messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] ??
messages.msgSnippet: Don t worry...it isn t you...  :) It was a different email address, and she was temporarily blocked from the list.  I hope she gets fixed soon. Ann
messages.messageBody:
Don't worry...it isn't you... :)
It was a different email address, and she was temporarily blocked from the list. I hope she gets fixed soon.
Ann
